name: Life Symphony (Louis Denizet)
description:
Game made for Climate Game Jam at Montpellier, France in 48h.

The game is made for 2 to 4 players simultaneous in a large tablet screen.

Players must cooperate to make the game progress and lead the planet toward a sustainable state.

Our concept seduced the jury and even if we slept on stone (castle stone) I am very happy with the result and we won bikes \o/
